tables.dividend_info: CREATE TABLE `dividend_info` (  `dividend_date` DATETIME NOT NULL,  `div_percent` FLOAT,  `symbol` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,  PRIMARY KEY (`dividend_date`, `symbol`)   )ENGINE=InnoDB
tables.split_info: CREATE TABLE `split_info` (  `split_date` DATETIME NOT NULL,  `split_ratio` VARCHAR(30),  `symbol` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,  PRIMARY KEY (`split_date`, `symbol`)   )ENGINE=InnoDB
tables.ticker_info: CREATE TABLE `ticker_info` (`sector` varchar(25) DEFAULT NULL,`fullTimeEmployees` int DEFAULT NULL,`city` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,`operatingCashflow` float DEFAULT NULL,`revenueGrowth` float DEFAULT NULL,`operatingMargins` float DEFAULT NULL,`ebitda` float DEFAULT NULL,`targetLowPrice` float DEFAULT NULL,`targetMeanPrice` float DEFAULT NULL,`targetHighPrice` float DEFAULT NULL,`recommendationKey` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL,`recommendationMean` float DEFAULT NULL,`grossProfits` float DEFAULT NULL,`freeCashflow` float DEFAULT NULL,`targetMedianPrice` float DEFAULT NULL,`currentPrice` float DEFAULT NULL,`earningsGrowth` float DEFAULT NULL,`currentRatio` float DEFAULT NULL,`returnOnAssets` float DEFAULT NULL,`debtToEquity` float DEFAULT NULL,`returnOnEquity` float DEFAULT NULL,`totalCash` float DEFAULT NULL,`totalDebt` float DEFAULT NULL,`totalRevenue` float DEFAULT NULL,`totalCashPerShare` float DEFAULT NULL,`financialCurrency` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL,`revenuePerShare` float DEFAULT NULL,`quickRatio` float DEFAULT NULL,`exchange` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL,`shortName` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,`longName` varchar(80) DEFAULT NULL,`exchangeTimezoneName` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,`exchangeTimezoneShortName` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL,`quoteType` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL,`symbol` varchar(25) NOT NULL,`annualHoldingsTurnover` float DEFAULT NULL,`enterpriseToRevenue` float DEFAULT NULL,`beta3Year` float DEFAULT NULL,`enterpriseToEbitda` float DEFAULT NULL,`52WeekChange` float DEFAULT NULL,`morningStarRiskRating` float DEFAULT NULL,`forwardEps` float DEFAULT NULL,`revenueQuarterlyGrowth` float DEFAULT NULL,`sharesOutstanding` float DEFAULT NULL,`annualReportExpenseRatio` float DEFAULT NULL,`totalAssets` float DEFAULT NULL,`bookValue` float DEFAULT NULL,`shareShort` float DEFAULT NULL,`sharesPercentSharesOut` float DEFAULT NULL,`heldPercentInstitutions` float DEFAULT NULL,`netIncomeToCommon` float DEFAULT NULL,`trailingEps` float DEFAULT NULL,`lastDividendValue` float DEFAULT NULL,`SandP52WeekChange` float DEFAULT NULL,`priceToBook` float DEFAULT NULL,`heldPercentInsiders` float DEFAULT NULL,`yield` float DEFAULT NULL,`mostRecentQuarter` float DEFAULT NULL,`shortRatio` float DEFAULT NULL,`sharesShortPreviousMonthDate` int DEFAULT NULL,`floatShares` float DEFAULT NULL,`beta` float DEFAULT NULL,`enterpriseValue` mediumtext,`priceHint` int DEFAULT NULL,`threeYearAverageReturn` mediumtext,`lastSplitDate` int DEFAULT NULL,`lastSplitFactor` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL,`legalType` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL,`lastDividendDate` int DEFAULT NULL,`morningStarOverallRating` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL,`earningsQuarterlyGrowth` float DEFAULT NULL,`priceToSalesTrailing12Months` float DEFAULT NULL,`dateShortInterest` int DEFAULT NULL,`pegRatio` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL,`ytdReturn` float DEFAULT NULL,`forwardPE` float DEFAULT NULL,`lastCapGain` float DEFAULT NULL,`shortPercentOfFloat` float DEFAULT NULL,`sharesShortPriorMonth` float DEFAULT NULL,`impliedSharesOutstanding` float DEFAULT NULL,`category` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,`fiveYearAverageReturn` float DEFAULT NULL,`previousClose` float DEFAULT NULL,`regularMarketOpen` float DEFAULT NULL,`twoHundredDayAverage` float DEFAULT NULL,`trailingAnnualDividendYield` float DEFAULT NULL,`payoutRatio` float DEFAULT NULL,`volume24Hr` float DEFAULT NULL,`regularMarketDayHigh` float DEFAULT NULL,`navPrice` float DEFAULT NULL,`averageDailyVolume10Day` float DEFAULT NULL,`regularMarketPreviousClose` float DEFAULT NULL,`fiftyDayAverage` float DEFAULT NULL,`trailingAnnualDividendRate` float DEFAULT NULL,`open` float DEFAULT NULL,`toCurrency` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL,`averageVolume10days` float DEFAULT NULL,`expireDate` int DEFAULT NULL,`algorithm` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,`dividendRate` float DEFAULT NULL,`exDividendDate` int DEFAULT NULL,`circulatingSupply` float DEFAULT NULL,`startDate` int DEFAULT NULL,`regularMarketDayLow` float DEFAULT NULL,`currency` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,`trailingPE` float DEFAULT NULL,`regularMarketVolume` float DEFAULT NULL,`lastMarket` float DEFAULT NULL,`maxSupply` float DEFAULT NULL,`openInterest` float DEFAULT NULL,`marketCap` float DEFAULT NULL,`volumeAllCurrencies` float DEFAULT NULL,`strikePrice` float DEFAULT NULL,`averageVolume` float DEFAULT NULL,`dayLow` float DEFAULT NULL,`ask` float DEFAULT NULL,`askSize` float DEFAULT NULL,`volume` float DEFAULT NULL,`fiftyTwoWeekHigh` float DEFAULT NULL,`fromCurrency` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL,`fiveYearAvgDividendYield` float DEFAULT NULL,`fiftyTwoWeekLow` float DEFAULT NULL,`bid` float DEFAULT NULL,`tradeable` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,`dividendYield` float DEFAULT NULL,`bidSize` float DEFAULT NULL,`dayHigh` float DEFAULT NULL,`regularMarketPrice` float DEFAULT NULL,`preMarketPrice` float DEFAULT NULL,`logo_url` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,`sentiment` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL,`sentiment_perc` FLOAT DEFAULT NULL,`date_of_trade` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`date_of_trade`, `symbol`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

queries.check_for_stock_in_ticker_info: Select count(*) from ticker_info where symbol='{}';
queries.check_for_stock_in_dividend_info: Select count(*) from dividend_info where symbol='{}';
queries.check_for_stock_in_split_info: Select count(*) from split_info where symbol='{}';
